mapper.sql: id, xh, xm, yx, nj, xb, csrq, xslb_id, xslbmc, sfzh, yjfx, jg, mz, zzmm, rxfs, ybyyx, xz, dsbh, dsxm, yx, xxxs, byjl, rxrq, lxdh, jtdz, yzydm, yzy, zy_id, zymc, sfsc, cjsj, cjr, gxsj, gxr
mapper.select: select xs.* from t_xs xs where xs.sfsc = false and xs.yh_id = #{yhId}
select * from t_xs xs where xs.sfsc = false and xs.xh like concat('%',trim(#{xh}),'%') and xs.xm like concat('%',trim(#{xm}),'%')
select xs.id from t_xs xs where xs.sfsc = false and xs.yzyds_id = (select sz.id from t_sz sz where sz.sfsc = false and sz.yh_id = #{yhId})
select xs.id from t_xs xs where xs.sfsc = false and (xs.bmfs is null or xs.bmfs = '') and xs.id in (select tpx.xs_id from t_pc_xs tpx where tpx.pc_id = #{pcId})
select xs.id from t_xs xs where xs.sfsc = false and xs.qyds_id = (select sz.id from t_sz sz where sz.sfsc = false and sz.yh_id = #{yhId})
